title: Trump tells military to prepare for 'action' against Islamist militants in Nigeria
description: The US president says his threat is over killings of Christians - though experts say there is no evidence they are disproportionately targeted.

title: Nigeria rejects claims of Christian genocide as Trump mulls military action
description: US president says he could send troops to Nigeria or carry out air strikes to stop alleged mass killings of Christians.

title: Nigeria responds to Trump's threat of military action
description: Nigeria has responded to Donald Trump's threat of military action by suggesting it would welcome help tackling Islamist insurgents, but insists America must respect its sovereignty.

title: This teen built an oasis for kids in a congested Nigerian megacity
description: A garbage-dump-turned-park in Lagos is providing room for children to roam free and play.
